data.text_area:
RISE Community Art is owned by RISE Ventures, a leading Community Development Programme provider that works across seven regions in Western Australia, Northern Territory and Queensland. RISE Ventures is a trusted partner of the National Indigenous Agency (NIAA) and Government in the delivery of Remote Employment Services for over 15 years.

RISE stands for Remote Indigenous Sustainable Enterprises and drives better social and economic outcomes to communities in remote Australia through partnerships, and now also assisting Artists in their pursuit of showcasing and selling their craft to the public through this website. 

Serving as a facilitator of arts, 100% of all sales revenue is received by the Artist which is industry-leading. You are assured of the marketplaces integrity and the Artists that choose to use RISE Community Arts as a platform to showcase and sell their work. 

We want to ensure you of the authenticity and highest ethical standards and thank you for supporting Indigenous Australians towards greater economic empowerment.
data.title: About Us
